name: Endless Dungeon (La debrouille)
description:
What if we change our point of view, and see what bosses live in their dark dungeons ? This is the story of an undefeated boss, died of boredom. His dream : change of scene, live new adventures, find love. You are this boss and you have to escape, for this you will have to create a bug in your dungeon. However, pay attention to don’t get killed by the players who are coming to fight you, because they will probably report the bug and destroy your only way to escape. After each fight, you have a break, take advantage of it to bug the game. Enjoy !
